title: Buddy visits Dunkin’, rides the cop slide as Instagrammer reenacts ‘Elf’ in Boston
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Picture it — Buddy the Elf, but it’s Boston 2025.
A Massachusetts influencer has gone viral for putting a distinctly local spin on the Christmas movie classic “Elf.

”Boston foodie and social media creator Colton Cunningham — known on TikTok and Instagram as @beefeatsfirst — recently donned the iconic green elf costume made famous by the hit 2003 film starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, and Zooey Deschanel.

title: 3 indicted in separate human trafficking cases on Cape Cod
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News The indictments, related to the trafficking and exploitation of minors, stem from three unrelated cases in Barnstable, Yarmouth, and Falmouth.
Three Cape Cod residents have been indicted by Barnstable County grand juries in separate human trafficking investigations conducted across the Cape, Cape and Islands District Attorney Robert J.
Galibois’s office announced.

title: DA: Quincy man facing attempted murder charges in Route 128 apparent road rage shooting
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Thomas Drequan Perkins allegedly fired shots at a vehicle after getting into a verbal altercation with a man at a Beverly rest stop.

A Quincy man pleaded not guilty in Salem District Court on Tuesday to multiple firearm-related charges stemming from an alleged shooting on Route 128 North earlier this week, Essex County District Attorney Paul F.
Tucker’s Office announced.

title: Bill Belichick, UNC fire multiple coordinators following losing season
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: College Sports Belichick’s Tar Heels finished the season with a 4-8 record (2-6 conference).
Bill Belichick and the University of North Carolina will have a different football coaching staff in 2026.
AP Photo/Phelan M.

title: Red Sox reportedly interested in left-handed relief pitcher Danny Coulombe
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Boston Red Sox The veteran southpaw sported a 2.
30 ERA in 55 appearances this past season.
Boston’s interest in Danny Coulombe comes after fellow southpaw relievers Steven Matz and Justin Wilson departed for free agency.

title: Patriots injury report: RB Terrell Jennings out, LB Robert Spillane questionable vs. Bills
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: New England Patriots Buffalo listed CB Christian Benford (toe) as questionable and did not rule any player out entering the weekend.
Head coach Mike Vrabel revealed who could be third-string RB Terrell Jennings's replacement.
Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff Both the Patriots and the Bills will square off for the second time this season with relatively healthy rosters.

title: Red Sox reportedly among ‘many’ teams interested in Cardinals 1B Willson Contreras
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox The Red Sox have already made a trade with the Cardinals this offseason.
Could they make another?
Willson Contreras has been one of the Cardinals' top hitters over the last few years.

title: Will Sunday’s Bills-Patriots game be a snow game? Here’s what latest weather projections say
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Most forecasts project snow on Sunday, but the precipitation might stop before the Bills-Patriots game begins.
Gillette Stadium has played host to a handful of memorable snow games over the years.

(Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff) By Conor Roche December 12, 2025 | 3:59 PM 2 minutes to read If Sunday’s Bills-Patriots game already wasn’t exciting enough, Mother Nature might provide some extra fun to the action at Gillette Stadium.

title: Tewksbury police search for driver who allegedly mowed down flock of seagulls on purpose
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News Tewksbury police said they found six dead seagulls in the strip mall parking lot.
Tewksbury police are looking to identify a driver accused of intentionally running over and killing several seagulls Thursday.

Tewksbury Police Department By Abby Patkin December 12, 2025 | 3:31 PM 1 minute to read Tewksbury police are asking for help identifying a driver they say intentionally ran over and killed several seagulls earlier this week.
